description: Royal Robbins took their classic 1/4 zip sweater and packed it with performance features for added breathability and comfort. Open stitch areas are intentionally placed in key heat zones for added ventilation. Combining the odor resistance and thermoregulation benefits of Merino wool with quick-drying, durable nylon, this 1/4 zip sweater is the perfect layer for adventuring during cool months.
name: Royal Robbins Ventour 1/4 Zip Sweater - Mens
